Brief Description: This module can follow a person within an environment that has already been mapped with the homer_mapping package.

Events.Description: Refers to the event of the robot finding somebody to follow.
Events.Name: foundPerson

Events.Description: Refers to the event of the robot losing track of the person that was being followed.
Events.Name: lostPerson

Functions.Description: This function will enable the robot to start following the first person within its range of view, if the followed person goes out of sight, the robot will stand-by and follow the next person that appears in its range of view.
Functions.Exec-condition: the environment must be already mapped
Functions.Name: followPeople

Functions.Description: This function will prevent the robot from following anybody. If this function is invoked while the robot is following somebody, it will stop and stay idle.
Functions.Name: stopFollowing
